title: How Kibbe body types became an internet obsession
description:
How an out-of-print style guide from the 1980s unexpectedly spawned an online fandom. Vox’s Terry Nguyen explains.
Read Terry’s story: https://www.vox.com/the-goods/22950721/david-kibbe-body-typing-explainer
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan, engineered by Jon Ehrens and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
